Entries.default:
"Magran's tits and Berath's balls! I swear these dice are fucking weighted."

The orlan fumes as the chuckling ocean folk sweeps up his coin. His large eyes swivel towards you.
"The merchants are all aft of here, mate. Talk to one of them if you aim to barter or buy."
"Want to make some coin?"
[Leave] "I'll be on my way."
The pair exchange quick glances.
"You think we're fools? To arms! We're under attack!"
"Ten thousand copper, free and clear."
"You can buy a lot with five thousand pands."
"On second thought, never mind."
Nodding, the pair reach for their weapons...
[Yell] "I would never be a party to mutiny!"
"Nobody's fool enough to fall for that hornswoggle!"
The pair shrug and return to their game.
"Impressive work. Take whatever you had your eyes on."
"Each?"
"Absolutely."
[Leave] "I'll return shortly."
"Ready then? We're none of us getting younger."
"Hope you ain't fond of that shirt on your back, 'cause I aim to claim it."
"Aye? Well my coin's on drake eyes, so stow the prattle and roll the dice."
"Who might you be?"
"We might be the hands. The hands and the blades. Paid no small share of the take to keep prying and questions to a minimum, savvy?"
"Something you want, mate?"
"Mind if I play?"

"No gambling with the customers."

She shakes her head.
"That hardly seems fair."
"We don't make the rules."
"Just enforce them."
"We're listening."
"Shove off, aye?"
"I'm of a mind to take this ship for everything it's worth."
"We're pretty well-compensated to stop just that sort of thing from transpiring."
"Gods dammit, I think they're falling for it!"
"Have to do better than that, mate."
"Each."
"Total, friends. Nothing to sneeze at for a few minutes' work."
"Suppose you have yourself a deal. Ready for some bloody work, then?"
"Think the pay's better for turning you in. Oi! This ass wants to take our ship!"
The woman lets out a long, low whistle, and the orlan jabs her with is elbow.
"Be quick about it. This agreement ain't eternal."
"The crew need protecting?"
"Ain't nobody here a slouch in a scuffle, friend."
"Seen Bauble over there tear kith clean in half."
"Total. And you'll like it."
"What was that? You said you wanted to take over the ship?"
